name: Tom Swifties 2 Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Example:  "Nina, Pinta, Santa Maria and Titanic," said Tom, ______. The correct answer is FOREBODINGLY.  

"I'm dying," Tom ______.
questions.explanation:
Croaked.

	Example explanation...Four boats  Croak is slang for die.

Cruelly.

	Crewel is a type of embroidery.

Quizzically.

	FunTrivia IS the best site on the Internet.

Periodically.

	This question was inspired by someone who took my previous Tom Swifty quiz and noted me a variation of this.

questions.text: "You look like the Venus de Milo," said Tom, _______.
questions.explanation:
Disarmingly.

	The statue has no arms ergo, Disarmingly.

Swiftly.

	Tom Swifties are puns derived from the overly descriptive writings of Victor Appleton, who created the 'Tom Swift' stories.

questions.text: "I can't believe I ate that whole pineapple" remarked Tom, ______.
questions.explanation:
Dolefully.

	Dole sells pineapples.  If you ate a whole one, you'd be full.

questions.text: "Elvis' daughter changed her last name," Tom said, _______.
questions.explanation:
Expressly.

	If Elvis's daughter changed her last name, she'd be an ex-Presley.

questions.text: "Turn three lefts and then go the other way," said Tom, _________.
questions.explanation:
Forthrightly.

	Three lefts then the other way, makes a fourth right.
